resource.name: NCDHC Composition Clinical Document Base
resource.description: This profile is used to represent the Compsition associated with a FHIR Clinical Document

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Estimated Date Of Birth
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content of FHIR document pertaining to details on Estimated Date of Birth

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Bloodspot Screen
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content necessary for Newborn Bloodspot Screen FHIR document.

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Discharge
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content of FHIR document pertaining to a newborn's discharge from a health facility including measurements, date of discharge and other identifying information

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Examination
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content necessary for Newborn Examination FHIR document.

resource.name: NCDHC Composition Newborn Hearing Screen
resource.description: Composition based profile to define the structure and narrative content necessary for Hearing Screen FHIR document.

resource.name: NCDHC Encounter CDHR
resource.description: This is the base NCDHC Encounter profile for CDHR Health Interactions.

resource.name: NCDHC Encounter DPHR
resource.description: This is the base NCDHC Encounter profile for DPHR Health Interactions.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Abdomen Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Abdomen check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Anus Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Anus check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Hearing Audiologist Referral Indication
resource.description: Observation profile to record indication on Audiologist Referral decision taken during Hearing Screening Test of the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Base
resource.description: This is the base profile for NCDHC Obsrevation. All NCDHC Observation profiles SHALL extend this profile (vital-sgins profiles are excluded)

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Breast feeding at time of conception
resource.description: Observation profile to record breast feeding status at time of conception of the expectant mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Cardiovascular / heart Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Cardiovascular / heart check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Estimated date of birth by Clinical Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record Estimated date of birth by Clinical Examination for the expectatnt mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Estimated Date of Birth
resource.description: Observation profile to record Estimated Date of Birth and associated details. Date of delivery (birth) is estimated based on a number of clinical factors and the woman’s cycle information

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Estimated date of birth by LNMP
resource.description: Observation profile to record Estimated date of birth by LNMP for the expectatnt mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Estimated date of birth by Ultra Sound
resource.description: Observation profile to record Estimated date of birth by ultra sound for the expectatnt mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Ears Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Right and Left Ear check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Eyes Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Right and Left Eye check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Feeding Method
resource.description: Observation profile to record Feeding Method for the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Feeding Status
resource.description: Observation profile to record Feeding Status of the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Femoral Pulses Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Right and Left Femoral Pulses check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Genitalia Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Genitalia check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Gestation Age
resource.description: Observation profile to set minimum expectations to record and search and fetch gestation age in weeks and days

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Head and Fontanelles Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the check performed around the anatomical feature of the infant skull

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Hips Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Hips check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Hormonal contraception At Time of Conception
resource.description: Observation profile to record Hormonal contraception being used at time of conception by the expectant mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation to indicate if Date of last period is consistent with USS
resource.description: Observation profile to record if the estimated date of delivery is consistent between last menstrual period and antenatal ultrasound scan for the expectatnt mother in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Limbs Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Limbs check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Milk Feeding Status
resource.description: Observation profile to record Milk Feeding Status of the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Mouth / Palate Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record Outcome of the Mouth / Palate check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Musculo Skeletal Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Musculo Skeletal check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Bloodspot Screen
resource.description: Observation profile to record completion status and any associated details of the test used to detect certain rare genetic conditions and disorders of the metabolism of the newborn in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Newborn Hearing Screen
resource.description: Observation profile to record Hearing Screening Test status and assoicated details for the newborn in context

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Reflexes / Neurological Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record Outcome of the Outcome of the Reflexes / Neurological Check (Physical examination checking the involuntary movements or actions to determine the wellbeing of the newborns brain and nervous system) performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Respiratory Rate Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Respiratory Rate check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Sex Detected At Birth
resource.description: Observation profile to record sex of the baby identified at birth

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Skin Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Skin check (Hyperpigmented macule, birthmarks, dry abrasions, bruises) performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Spine Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Spine check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Testes fully descended R/L Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Testes check performed on the newborn male Patient

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Umbilicus Examination
resource.description: Observation profile to record outcome of the Umbilicus check performed on the newborn

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Body Height Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Body Height or Birth Length of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Body Weight Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Body Weight of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Vital Sign Head Circumference Profile
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation Vital Sign resource to record, search and fetch Head Circumference of the patient in context.

resource.name: NCDHC Organisation
resource.description: Profile to represent a Organisation in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Child Patient
resource.description: Profile to represent a Child Patient in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Expectant Mother Patient
resource.description: Profile to represent a Expectant Mother Patient in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Practitioner
resource.description: Profile to represent a Practitioner in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC PractitionerRole
resource.description: Profile to represent a PractitionerRole in NCDHC Context

resource.name: NCDHC Audiologist Referral Status ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHCValueSetAudiologist Referral Status are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Certainty Of Menstrual Cycle
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to determine what type of Observation Certainty Of Menstrual Cycle are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC Detected Sex ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Detected Sex.

resource.name: NCDHC Feeding Method ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Feeding Method.

resource.name: NCDHC ValueSet Generic Yes No
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to represent generic Yes/No value.

resource.name: NCDHC Milk Feeding Status ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of NCDHC ValueSet Milk Feeding Status.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Completion Status
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Completion Status are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC Observation DataAbsentReason ValueSet
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Values to represent what type of Observation Data Absent Reasons are applicable when the Observation instance doesn't contain any value

resource.name: NCDHC Observation Interpretation
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to determine what type of Observation Interpretation are applicable to each completed check/observation.

resource.name: NCDHC ValueSet Regularity Of Menstrual Cycle
resource.description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Codes to determine what type of Observation Regularity Of Menstrual Cycle are applicable to each completed check/observation.
